theorem (in SecurityInvariant_withOffendingFlows) ENFnrSR_offending_set: "\<lbrakk> sinvar_all_edges_normal_form_not_refl_SR P \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> set_offending_flows G nP = (if sinvar G nP then {} else { {(e1,e2). (e1, e2) \<in> edges G \<and> e1 \<noteq> e2 \<and> \<not> P (nP e1) e1 (nP e2) e2} })"
